thread_replies.author: GlÃ¸rd.Sign
thread_replies.text: Just a glimpse and this destructive power... When it's implemented, it'll stir up the sword world again, right? Waiting in seiza for the follow-up.

thread_replies.author: Vindicated Chidi
thread_replies.text:
The visuals of the new Touken Danshi are already building up expectations just from the atmosphere alone, aren't they?  
I'm looking forward to the announcement of the full reveal and implementation date. I'm keeping an eye on further updates for how the world of the work will

thread_replies.author: saint â€
thread_replies.text: Naginata straight blade? Banzai music? No way, Hasekura Kunishige's brother, Hasekura Kuninobu's sword, Touhaku Kuninobu? Atsuta Kuninobu? Okubo slasher? Wait a sec, Hasekura, Hasekureeeee!!
